title: FS: T206 Duffy Tolstoi and McGraw w/ Cap Old Mill

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Duffy Tolstoi and McGraw w/ Cap Old Mill
posts.post_content:
I’ve upgraded a few cards from my offback T206 set, so I have these available. Cards are priced shipped with tracking. PayPal FF.

T206 Duffy (HOF) Tolstoi SGC 1 - $260
T206 McGraw (HOF) w/ Cap Old Mill - $75 **SOLD**
McGraw sold, price reduced on Duffy.
